question: Can you help me plan a weekly meal prep schedule that includes healthy recipes?
true_answer: A comprehensive weekly meal prep schedule with healthy recipes has been provided.

steps.description: Compile and organize recipes by meals

plan.current_objective: Create a detailed weekly meal prep plan

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Healthy recipes should balance nutrients and are suitable for meal prep. Consider dietary preferences and time efficiency.

steps.content: Can you help me plan a weekly meal prep schedule that includes healthy recipes?
Creating an initial plan: 1) Identify types of meals. 2) Research healthy recipes. 3) Generate schedule.
Decomposing task into sub-tasks: recipe research, recipe organization, schedule creation.
Assigning healthy recipe research to researcher agent.
Searching for healthy recipes suitable for meal prep.
Found recipes: quinoa salad, grilled chicken with veggies, overnight oats.
Updating plan: Mark recipe research as completed.
Assigning recipe organization to analyzer agent.
Organizing recipes into breakfast, lunch, and dinner categories.
Recipes organized successfully: Breakfast - overnight oats; Lunch - quinoa salad; Dinner - grilled chicken.
Feedback to planner: Recipe organization complete.
Updating plan based on feedback.
Assigning schedule generation to browser agent.
Generating meal prep schedule for the week.
Schedule generated: Monday to Sunday with meals assigned per day.
Updating plan: Mark schedule generation as completed.
Updating memory with completed meal prep plan and recipe details.
A comprehensive weekly meal prep schedule with healthy recipes has been provided.
Task completed successfully.
Ensuring memory consistency with new insights and updates.
